newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's Fujimori says "all hostages safe and sound".
newsitem.headline: Peru's Fujimori says "all hostages safe and sound".

text.p: Peruvian President Alberto Fujimori said on Tuesday all 72 hostages held by Marxixt rebels were "safe and sound" despite reports that one of the captives had died.
An ecstatic-looking Fujimori shouted the news to crowds lining the streets as he rode a bus taking released hostages to hospital.
"President, we are with you," shouted one passerby as Fujimori waved a Peruvian flag.
Local radio and television, and several prominent Congressmen, have said one hostage died in the storming of the besieged residence.
